page.title: 15PASTIMES FOR ADULTS
page.content: There are many sports clubs in the area such as Cricket, Tennis, Squash, Badminton, Snooker, Football, Running and many more.Walking is a very popular pastime because the area is rural. The Pennines are near. There are also Social and Working Men's Clubs and Women's Institutes. Every village has a Community Hall where dances and other social events are held. At home many people do sewing, knitting and gardening.There is a garden centre in Shelley called the Pennine Garden Centre.There are opportunities to compete with gardening produce and crafts in the neighbouring shows which are held annually. Also in Kirkburton is the Civic Society, which though small is very active.
